<template>
  <wavesurfer.js-vue src="url.mp3" ref="surf"></wavesurfer.js-vue>
</template>

<script>
import WaveSurferVue from "wavesurfer.js-vue";

export default {
  mounted() {
    this.player.on('ready', () => {
      console.log('ready')
    })
  },
  computed: {
    player() {
      return this.$refs.surf.waveSurfer
    }
  }
}

</script>


<style scoped>


</style>
